pr_title: Don't include SUGGESTION checks in default checks

timeline.bodyText: seems like this should be an error
timeline.author: ferozco
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -41,7 +42,7 @@
         link = "https://github.com/palantir/gradle-baseline#baseline-error-prone-checks",
         linkType = BugPattern.LinkType.CUSTOM,
         providesFix = BugPattern.ProvidesFix.REQUIRES_HUMAN_ATTENTION,
-        severity = BugPattern.SeverityLevel.SUGGESTION,
+        severity = SeverityLevel.WARNING,

replies.bodyText: I think we want WARN here, iirc we use a flag to ignore error-prone warnings in generated code but it doesn't apply to errors.
replies.author: carterkozak

replies.bodyText:
I believe we explicitly opt out of errorprone on generated source sets: 
  
    
      gradle-baseline/gradle-baseline-java/src/main/groovy/com/palantir/baseline/plugins/BaselineErrorProne.java
    
    
         Line 210
      in
      a63a0ad
    
    
    
    

        
          
           .set(String.format(
replies.author: ferozco

replies.bodyText: Can we change this in a FLUP? I'd prefer not to accidentally break things in this PR.
replies.author: pkoenig10

replies.bodyText: +1 for handling warn->error separately. I don't think our regex catches 100% of generated code and I'm not sure it's worth the risk breaking some folks in order to fail builds in repos that don't fail on errors
replies.author: carterkozak

timeline.author: ferozco
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -33,7 +34,7 @@
         name = "StreamOfEmpty",
         link = "https://github.com/palantir/gradle-baseline#baseline-error-prone-checks",
         linkType = BugPattern.LinkType.CUSTOM,
-        severity = BugPattern.SeverityLevel.SUGGESTION,
+        severity = SeverityLevel.WARNING,

replies.bodyText:
I think the risk with making some of these errors is that repos which have a bunch of existing violation will be blocked. WARNING seems a bit safer because it's won't fail compilation unless you have -Werror.
Happy to change it if you would still prefer ERROR, just wanted to point this out.
replies.author: pkoenig10

replies.bodyText: in practice these rules will be auto applied on upgrade so I'm not particularly worried about blocking upgrades.
replies.author: ferozco

timeline.message: Don't include SUGGESTION checks in default checks
Don't include SUGGESTION checks in default checks
